text: The 1956–57 Eredivisie was the 1st Eredivisie ever played. AFC Ajax won the tournament. The teams were chosen from the last seasons Netherlands Football League Championship. == Table == Pos Team Pld Won Drw Lst GF GA Pts GD Notes 1 AFC Ajax 34 22 5 7 64 40 49 +24 Qualified for 1957–58 European Cup. 2 Fortuna '54 34 20 5 9 76 48 45 +28 Winners of the KNVB Cup 1956-57. 3 SC Enschede 34 15 11 8 81 47 41 +34 4 MVV Maastricht 34 15 10 9 53 42 40 +11 5 PSV Eindhoven 34 18 3 13 93 71 39 +22 6 Feijenoord 34 15 9 10 79 58 39 +21 7 VVV '03 34 16 6 12 50 53 38 -3 8 Sparta Rotterdam 34 12 12 10 66 59 36 +7 9 NAC 34 14 8 12 59 61 36 -2 10 DOS 34 17 1 16 79 75 35 -4 11 Rapid JC 34 13 7 14 64 63 33 -1 12 NOAD 34 12 7 15 54 64 31 -10 13 BVC Amsterdam 34 11 8 15 49 67 30 -18 14 GVAV 34 9 10 15 52 66 28 -14 15 BVV 34 11 4 19 70 76 26 -6 16 Elinkwijk 34 10 4 20 52 87 24 -25 17 Willem II 34 8 6 20 59 79 22 -20 Relegated to Eerste Divisie 18 FC Eindhoven 34 8 4 22 39 83 20 -44 Relegated to Eerste Divisie == References == Category:Football in the Netherlands Category:1956 in European football Category:1957 in Europe Category:1950s in the Netherlands Category:1957 in sports
title: 1956–57 Eredivisie
